abstract: Users didn’t laugh at a software developer’s creation of a pricey iPhone application that gave them nothing more than an image of a multifaceted ruby.
snippet: Users didn’t laugh at a software developer’s creation of a pricey iPhone application that gave them nothing more than an image of a multifaceted ruby.
lead_paragraph: When Apple announced in March that it would open up the iPhone to outside software developers, it promised that the resulting applications would help create “amazing” and “innovative” applications that would transform the concept of a smartphone.

headline.main: Many Fail to See the Humor in ‘I Am Rich’ for the iPhone
headline.print_headline: Many Fail to See the Humor In ‘I Am Rich’ for the iPhone
